item.description:
Hey, everyone! Time for some fun writing exercises again. So bring your best and prepare to do your worst (meaning, of course, your best. Does anyone else actually GET this phrase?)

If you have any fun exercises or brainstorming activities, please bring 'em! Or, if you can't make it, e-mail me the details.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs in the cafe loft, either in the front or the back.
item.name: Writing Exercises a'Plenty
